cards.title: What is Data Science?
cards.content: Data Science involves extracting actionable insights from raw data using various scientific methods, algorithms, and processes. It provides tools for working with data from diverse sources, including financial logs, multimedia files, and sensors.

cards.title: What does a Data Scientist do?
cards.content: A data scientist analyzes data to provide actionable insights for various processes. They possess strong statistical, analytical, and technical skills to work with structured and unstructured data.
listItems: Identify data sources and collect data.
Formulate strategies to solve business challenges.

cards.title: Why take Data Science training?
cards.content: Data scientists are in high demand across industries, making a Data Science certification valuable. Our training course is designed for both beginners and professionals to equip them with essential skills.

listItems: Identify data sources and collect data.
Formulate strategies to solve business challenges.
